QuestData.Title: Happy Hour
QuestData.Description:
Now that the merchandise is back, it's time ta get everything else sorted out.
With everything going on some of my crew decided it would be okay to disappear for some extended meal times. See if ye can find them and get them back here.
We can all celebrate AFTER the work is done.
QuestData.LogDescription: Throw briny seawater at 3 workers in Stormwind.

Objectives.Objective: Worker Splashed in the Trade District
Worker Splashed in the Dwarven District
